ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrke: He was just trying to find something to do. He walked down the many curving corridors of the Trypicon. It was much larger than the Darkside.

Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Quickstrke:







He was just trying to find something to do. He walked down the many 
curving corridors of the Trypicon. It was much larger than the 
Darkside. Quickstrike spent several mega-cycles exploring. He walked 
through some corridors that he hadn't the chance to explore. He only 
managed to reconize at least two or more corridors. He learned the 
pathway from the ramp by spark. 

He went down another corridor, when he heard CyberShark's voice on 
his comm-link. He stopped in his tracks, and listened. He wanted to 
find out what he wanted, but something told him to play dead. 

Be quiet, he said to himself. Play dead, play dead, play dead. 
Somebody will get to him.
